services.name: Netflix
services.description: Watch Netflix films & TV programmes online or stream right to your smart TV, game console, PC, Mac, mobile, tablet and more.

services.name: Trello
services.description: Infinitely flexible. Incredibly easy to use. Great mobile apps. It's free. Trello keeps track of everything, from the big picture to the minute details.

services.name: Hulu
services.description: Watch TV shows and movies online. Stream TV episodes of South Park, Empire, SNL, Modern Family and popular movies on your favorite devices

services.name: Todoist
services.description: Trusted by millions, Todoist is the best online task management app and to do list. For Web, iPhone, iPad, Android, Chrome, Outlook and many more!

services.name: Evernote
services.description: Organize your work and declutter your life. With Evernote on your desktop and mobile devices, your notes are always with you and always in sync.

services.name: Dropbox
services.description: Dropbox is a modern workspace designed to reduce busywork-so you can focus on the things that matter. Sign in and put your creative energy to work.

services.name: Github
services.description: GitHub for teams. A better way to work together. GitHub brings teams together to work through problems, move ideas forward, and learn from each other along the way.

services.name: Spotify
services.description: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs.

services.name: Harvest
services.description: Simple time tracking, fast online invoicing, and powerful reporting software. Simplify employee timesheets and billing.

services.name: Pocket
services.description: A great option for those interested in saving video, images, text and other content, all in one place
